scripts.lint: echo 'Lint setup pending - add eslint/prettier later'
scripts.ci: npm run type-check && npm run build
scripts.pre-release: echo '⚠️  PRE-RELEASE CHECKLIST:' && echo '[ ] Update package.json version' && echo '[ ] Update CHANGELOG.md' && echo '[ ] Update RELEASE_NOTES.md' && echo '[ ] Run npm run ci' && echo '[ ] Test with npm run preview' && echo '[ ] Verify feature flags' && npm run ci
scripts.release-check: echo '🔍 Release validation...' && npm run ci && npm run preview -- --host localhost --port 5174 &
scripts.release-tag: echo '⚠️  Run: git tag -a vX.X.X -m "Release message"' && echo '⚠️  Then: git push --follow-tags'
scripts.workflow-help: echo '📋 WORKFLOW HELP:' && echo 'Development: npm run dev' && echo 'Validate: npm run ci' && echo 'Release prep: npm run pre-release' && echo 'Release template: npm run release-notes-template' && echo 'Create tag: npm run release-tag' && echo 'See: WORKFLOW.md for details'
